amendment.description: Amendment expands the definition of grants under the bill in order to focus attention on The Regional Innovative Program as a tool for job creation initiatives.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to expand the definition of grants to include grants authorized under section 27 of the Stevenson-Wydler Technology Innovation Act of 1980.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cicilline amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Cicilline.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Cicilline amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
